data.lyric:
[ti:needy ((Explicit))]
[ar:Ariana Grande]
[al:thank u, next ((Explicit))]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]needy (Explicit) - Ariana Grande (爱莉安娜·格兰德)
[00:03.74]Lyrics by：Tommy Brown/Ariana Grande/Victoria Monet/Tayla Parx
[00:07.48]Composed by：Tommy Brown/Ariana Grande/Victoria Monet/Tayla Parx
[00:11.23]If you take too long to hit me back
[00:14.06]I can't promise you how I'll react
[00:16.76]But all I can say
[00:19.48]Is at least I'll wait for you
[00:22.32]Lately I've been on a roller coaster
[00:25.05]Tryna get a hold of my emotions
[00:27.58]But all that I know is I need you close
[00:31.99]And I'ma scream and shout for what I love
[00:34.83]Passionate but I don't give no f**ks
[00:38.08]I admit that I'm a lil' messed up
[00:40.36]But I can hide it when I'm all dressed up
[00:42.96]I'm obsessive and I love too hard
[00:45.88]Good at overthinking with my heart
[00:48.52]How you even think it got this far
[00:52.01]This far
[00:53.86]And I can be needy way too d**n needy
[00:59.45]I can be needy tell me how good it feels to be needed
[01:07.74]I can be needy so hard to please me
[01:12.60]I know it feels so good to be needed
[01:17.63]Sorry if I'm up and down a lot yeah
[01:20.76]Sorry that I think I'm not enough
[01:22.94]And sorry if I say sorry way too much
[01:28.54]You can go ahead and call me selfish selfish
[01:31.37]But after all this damage I can't help it help it
[01:34.11]But what you can trust is I need your touch
[01:38.23]I'ma scream and shout for what I love
[01:41.01]Passionate but I don't give no f**ks
[01:43.75]I admit that I'm a lil' messed up
[01:46.56]But I can hide it when I'm all dressed up
[01:49.26]I'm obsessive and I love too hard
[01:52.06]Good at overthinking with my heart
[01:54.73]How you even think it got this far
[01:58.83]This far
[02:00.08]And I can be needy way too d**n needy
[02:05.60]I can be needy tell me how good it feels to be needed
[02:13.96]I can be needy so hard to please me
[02:18.75]I know it feels so good to be needed
data.trans:
[ti:needy (Explicit)]
[ar:Ariana Grande]
[al:thank u, next (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.74]//
[00:07.48]//
[00:11.23]如果你很久才回我电话
[00:14.06]我也不能确定我会作何反应
[00:16.76]我只能说
[00:19.48]至少我会等你
[00:22.32]最近我的情绪起伏很大
[00:25.05]想要控制自己的情绪
[00:27.58]但我只知道自己迫切地需要你
[00:31.99]我要为自己的热爱呐喊
[00:34.83]热情似火 但我一点不在乎
[00:38.08]我承认我有点混乱
[00:40.36]但我可以用精致的妆容完美掩饰
[00:42.96]我太过迷恋 爱得太深
[00:45.88]特别喜欢东想西想
[00:48.52]你以为我是怎么变成这样的
[00:52.01]这样的
[00:53.86]我也会需要别人 需要一个依靠
[00:59.45]我也会需要别人 告诉我被人需要的感觉怎么样
[01:07.74]我也会需要别人 讨好我可不容易
[01:12.60]我知道被需要的感觉有多好
[01:17.63]抱歉我总是阴晴不定
[01:20.76]抱歉我总是不满足
[01:22.94]抱歉我说了太多抱歉
[01:28.54]你可以说我自私
[01:31.37]但经历这么多伤痛 我也不能自已
[01:34.11]怎样你才信 我需要你的怀抱
[01:38.23]我要为自己的热爱呐喊
[01:41.01]热情似火 但我一点不在乎
[01:43.75]我承认我有点混乱
[01:46.56]但我可以用精致的妆容完美掩饰
[01:49.26]我太过迷恋 爱得太深
[01:52.06]特别喜欢东想西想
[01:54.73]你以为我是怎么变成这样的
[01:58.83]这样的
[02:00.08]我也会需要别人 需要一个依靠
[02:05.60]我也会需要别人 告诉我被人需要的感觉怎么样
[02:13.96]我也会需要别人 讨好我可不容易
[02:18.75]我知道被需要的感觉有多好
